reviewText: I have signed copies of these instructional dvd's. I've had the opportunity to train with the Mayweather Family at the Mayweather Boxing Club in Las Vegas, NV. I must say that I learned a whole lot about the sport of boxing. There is a reason why the Mayweather Family is at the top in the sport of boxing. If your serious about boxing then you definitely need to purchase the complete set today! I've even been blessed to watch Floyd Mayweather himself trained in person at his gym. TBE: THE BEST EVER. Hard Work and Dedicated is the Key to Success.
